overview:
Jakub Bednar is the director at Bednar International Pty Ltd, which owns and operates various online directories, stores and community websites. After completing grade 12 at Merrimac High School, Jakub received his Certificate IV in Programming and Networking at the Gold Coast Institute of TAFE.

With a passion for building websites, Jakub started off by developing simple sites for his friends. Not being able to secure a local IT position with his qualification, Jakub decided to create his own online businesses.

Jakub enjoys the outdoors, particularly hiking and surfing and loves to play chess. He spends his free time in the gym and walking his dog, Jason.
